TextView.android:text: This App Crafterina is designed to sell handmade craft items at reasonable prices for the creative minds who needs an online plateform to sell their creative items. This App is dedicated to a girl named Asmeka Jain from a very small town in Madhya Pradesh.The idea was developed to bring her creativity before the world. Anybody can sell their items on this app but you need to get permission from the admin . You can send a mail to the admin including images of your designed items.You can order your things, you can call us by clicking on call button, you can order through mail also. You can do the payment through Paytm also on our mobile number 9425626398 with a comment of your order. Please Do share our app to maximum so that everyone can be profitted from it.
